title: Is Dragonblade Riven and Warring Kingdoms Tryndamere still staying after the 23rd?

replies.body: They're still legacy skins, which means that they'll be returning to the vault after the Lunar Revel.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=To7F7zvR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-11T20:42:21.167+0000)
>
> They're still legacy skins, which means that they'll be returning to the vault after the Lunar Revel.

Alright thanks! This is my first Lunal Revel so I didn't know.
No worries at all! Not all Lunar Revel skins are legacy, so I can't say I blame you for asking!  :]
hello, will warring kingdoms tryndamere be available anytime in the future, or even in upcoming lunar revel events? thank you in advance
Hey! He usually comes back during the Lunar Revel event. :) It's possible he may show up sooner, but no definite times other than Lunar Revel.
